content: DERMU Romain (room 508) / 06.78.47.95.04
The breakfast room is located on the main floor and is open between 7am and 9am
You will find everything you need for breakfast (drinks: tea, coffee, hot chocolate, orange juice, apple juice; white bread, flat bread; jam, spreads, butter; cereals)!
Dishes are not provided, so please bring your own!
Please note that during the COVID period, a maximum of 10 people are allowed in the room at any one time (8 seated for 2 standing)!
The floor kitchens are located on the 2nd, 4th, 5th and 6th floors, next to the lift
Please note that during the COVID period, 4 people are allowed in the kitchens (2 seated for 2 standing)

colInfo.title: ADRESSE
colInfo.info2: 7bis Rue de la Digue, 59000 Lille
